system.effect: The mighty attack takes a sizeable chunk out of the target and knocks him to the ground as he clutches the oozing wound, shrieking in pain. The target is knocked Prone, suffers Blood Loss, and suffers [[1d10]] Toughness damage.

description.value:
Rending Damage to Body (Severity 6)

The mighty attack takes a sizeable chunk out of the target and knocks him to the ground as he clutches the oozing wound, shrieking in pain. The target is knocked Prone, suffers Blood Loss, and suffers [[1d10]] Toughness damage.
